title: Luis Escobar (footballer)
text:
Luis Fernando Escobar (born 19 March 1984) is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> striker who most recently played for <a href="Liga%20Paname%C3%B1a%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol">Liga Panameña de Fútbol</a> team <a href="Sporting%20San%20Miguelito">Sporting San Miguelito</a>.
Club career.
Escobar participated in the <a href="CONCACAF%20Champions%20League%202008-09">CONCACAF Champions League 2008-09</a> with FC Tauro and scored 1 goal in 8 games.
